adjectives.description: torrefied (comparative more torrefied, superlative most torrefied)

entries.meaning: Having undergone torrefaction; dried or roasted.
examples: For brewing our bitters we only use pale malt, torrefied wheat, and hops.
Torrefied biomass is more brittle than raw biomass and has a higher carbon content.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of torrefy
